RT Tickets Resolved/Code Changes For ZMap 0.1.120

Last Release Date: 07/04/2011

Current Release Date: 6 May 2011 at 13h.47m.51s

This report covers 2011-04-07 to 2011-05-06

Request Tracker Tickets Resolved


zmap
  • Ticket No.207617, Resolved (Tue Apr 19 16:56:17 2011)

    ZMap should send the complete stderr of pipe servers back to its clients

    jh13@sanger.ac.uk

  • Ticket No.211591, Resolved (Wed Apr 13 12:01:39 2011)

    loss of marked region following reverse complementing in Zmap

    gm5@sanger.ac.uk

  • Ticket No.211614, Resolved (Fri Apr 08 12:50:43 2011)

    copy and pasting in the DNA search window in Zmap.

    mpk@sanger.ac.uk


Code Changes From CVS/GIT Repositories


ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2011_04_07.08_58_02.shtml
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.29259/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapUtilsGUI.h, zmapUtils/zmapGUIutils.c: tidy up cursor routines, add a no-entry cursor.
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapUtils.h, zmapUtils/Makefile.am, zmapUtils/zmapRadixSort.c: zmapRadixSort now comiles but is not called so is safe to include
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapUtils.h, zmapUtils/zmapRadixSort.c, zmapView/zmapViewFeatureMask.c, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerSummarise.c: saved debugged radix sort code - iffed out so quite safe
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow_P.h: add macro for window-only busy cursor calls.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c, zmapWindowColBump.c: replace busy cursor calls with internal macro for busy cursor.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDraw.c: fix bug causing separator drawing to crash and fix busy cursor macro calls.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: add to allow separate busy cursors for non-windows and windows functions, try to make cursor go/off better.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: small adjustment to busy cursor going off.
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapString.h, zmapUtils/zmapString.c: redo remove spaces func so it also removes control chars.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDNA.c: change remove spaces call to remove spaces + control chars call, allows cut/paste of FASTA dna directly into dna search window.
  • src/: zmapFeature/zmapFeature.c, zmapFeature/zmapFeatureContext.c, zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: fixed lower cased features_loaded message + removed load cols debug
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: turn off debug output.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowMark_P.h: add comment to header.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowFeatureFuncs.c, zmapWindow_P.h: add blixem call func that gives position to center on.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItem.c: fix bug in offset position for sequence not starting at one.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowMenus.c: add code to call blixem with mouse position when called from column background.
  • src/zmapGFF/zmapGFF2parser.c: remove erroneous leading tab from own_sequence search string.
  • src/zmapView/zmapView.c: fix missing newline in print.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapCoords.c: add func. to map coords to a given base offset.
  • src/zmapGFF/zmapGFF2Dumper.c: fix start_not_found nomenclature.
  • src/zmapGFF/zmapGFF2parser.c: fix buglets in start_not_found & end_not_found processing.
  • src/zmapServer/acedb/acedbServer.c: sequence or peptide are now just mode SEQUENCE.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColBump.c: use proper call to test is feature is peptide.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDNAChoose.c: fix bugs in coords caused by broken handling of sequences not starting at 1.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowFeatureShow.c: switch to single sequence mode and fix start nto found name.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowStats.c: fix single sequence mode.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItem.c: fix bug where we don't unhighlight correctly for reverse stranded for dna/3 frame.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowFeature.c: switch to single sequence mode and fix start not found name.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c: move to single sequence mode, use func to decide if sequence is dna or peptide.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapGUIutils.c: add support to colour displayed text.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapUtils.h: add function to map coords to arbitrary offset.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapUtilsGUI.h: add support for colouring text.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureUtils.c: move to single sequence mode, fix start not found name, fix bugs in tranlation code.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureData.c: move to single sequence mode. Fix coding/non-coding terms for exons.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureDNA.c: move to single sequence mode.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureTranscript.c: add some transcript feature functions, e.g. annotated exons.
  • src/zmapFeature/Makefile.am: add zmapFeatureTranscript.c to build.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowCanvasItem.c: move to single sequence mode.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowSequenceFeature.c: remove detailed exon stuff, put in zmapFeature, add calls to test sequence type.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowTextItem.c: add text selection colour.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: move to single sequence mode.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemText.c: remove exon stuff to zmapFeature, fix bugs in 'show translation in zmap' code.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow_P.h: dna choose now returns chosen sequence coords.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowMenus.c: add code to colour transcript text in separate window.
  • src/zmapFeature/: zmapStyle.c, zmapFeatureTypes.c: add code to support colouring exon and translation text to show coding, frame etc.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapStyleUtils.c: move to single sequence mode.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureTranscript.c: add some debug code.
  • src/: zmapConfig/zmapConfigLoader.c, include/ZMap/zmapStyle.h: add code to support colouring exon and translation text to show coding, frame etc.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapFeature.h: add annotated exon struct, fix start_not_found name, add new sequence and transcript funcs.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeature.c: add funcs to test type of sequence, fix start_not_found name.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeature3FrameTranslation.c: add funcs to test type of sequence.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureContext.c: fix bug in getting dna, tidy up unused code.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapGUIutils.c: missed removal of fields in internal struct.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureTranscript.c: remove unused variables, fix debug print routine.

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • w7/smapconvert.c: fix bug in start_not_found setting, fix various trivial compile errors.
  • w3rdparty/: include-config, libs-config: remove setting of PKG_CONFIG_PATH, produces errors in package finding.
  • wmake/: LINUX_64_BLXNEW_DEF, LINUX_64_DEF: fix up path to gtk install in /software.

Seqtools Changes/Fixes [from git]
  • Browse CVS
  • Fixed a bug where start coord was not being bounds checked
  • Incremented version to 4.1.16
  • Fixed a regression where the initial display range was being overwritten
  • Fixed a regression where Blixem was not centering on the start coord
  • Fixed a regression where Blixem was not using the start coord correctly
